about_the_game:
Escape from a demon-infested futuristic colony!

Trapped inside a massive structure that was once built to shelter humanity from a cataclysm, three rebels find the mysterious devices know as Exomakers: powerful artifacts capable of extracting the essence of the heart and empowering its user with transmuted armor. Now clad in formidable battle gear, they are tasked with banishing all the mechanical horrors that lurk within and eliminating the source of evil once and for all!

Choose your character:

Brave: Separated from his body and kept in insolation as punishment, excels at close quarters combat, making him the recommended choice for beginners. His jabs are strong, fast and reliable. Can materialize weapons for special attacks;

Aurelia: Genetically modified into a demonic warrior for military purposes, fights from a safer distance and is able to summon Guardians to help dispatch enemy groups. Look for openings to inflict major damage;

?????: The colony citizens' collective sense of hope materialized into a mechanical body. Has less conventional gameplay and can be devastating in the right hands.

Features:

  • Meticulously detailed pixel art graphics;

  • Branching paths;

  • Multiple endings;

  • Simple controls, dynamic gameplay: Enhance your weapons, switch armaments for attack bonuses and unleash special powers by timing your strikes!

This game is a work in progress!

Follow Roborar Digital's social medias to check the game's development!

short_description: Exobrave is a 2D action-platformer that features a highly engaging combat system. Fight your way through the many branching paths of a futuristic colony infested by demon-possessed automatons - in a solo or co-op adventure!
